name: Dance Studio VR
description: Dance Studio VR is a virtual reality dancing game. The Player can choose different characters to play as, and can choose their own songs to play. The goal of the game is to mimic the dance moves of the other two characters in the studio. The faster and more accurate the players moves, the faster they win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SPI or better Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
